multi cloud security observability solution

Web tools to visualize current configuration settings and provide best practices to protect against security threats caused by infrastructure misconfigurations in multicloud environments

ABOUT

Our solution is

MultiCloud Security Advisory Web Tool

  • - Visualization of Current Security Settings
  • - Alert Setting Errors
  • - Notification of best practices Giudelines

Protecting your multi-cloud infrastructure from security threat

Main Topic

INSTANCE

Access control, Unauthorized user access, Snapshot

IAM

Overly Permission, Password Policy, MFA, Key rotating, Temporary authority

NETWORK

At least permission of network access settings, Invalid ACL Policy, Logging

STORAGE

Encrypted data at rest and data in transit, Unauthorized user access

DATABASE

Invalid ACL Policy, Unauthorized user access, Existence of backup, At least Encrypted database
